content.prompt: Which of the following is an example of a phishing attack?

choices.label: Loading malicious software onto a user’s computer in order to secretly gain access to sensitive information
Flooding a user’s computer with e-mail requests in order to cause the computer to crash
Gaining remote access to a user’s computer in order to steal user IDs and passwords
Using fraudulent e-mails in order to trick a user into voluntarily providing sensitive information

skill.text: Skill 5.E: Evaluate the use of computing based on legal and ethical factors.
